analysis.description:
ENJToken.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/2/0x9b73d1779c41dca36314fb7c4d3309838e20c4e7.sol#291-292) shadows:
	- ERC20Token.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/2/0x9b73d1779c41dca36314fb7c4d3309838e20c4e7.sol#194)

Reentrancy in ENJCrowdfund.deliverPresaleTokenToClient (/unique_chucks/2/0x9b73d1779c41dca36314fb7c4d3309838e20c4e7.sol#592-602):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(_accountHolder,_amountofENJ) (/unique_chucks/2/0x9b73d1779c41dca36314fb7c4d3309838e20c4e7.sol#596)
	- token.addToAllocation(_amountofENJ) (/unique_chucks/2/0x9b73d1779c41dca36314fb7c4d3309838e20c4e7.sol#596)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalPresaleTokensYetToAllocate (/unique_chucks/2/0x9b73d1779c41dca36314fb7c4d3309838e20c4e7.sol#597-602)

ENJCrowdfund.deliverPresaleTokenToClient (/unique_chucks/2/0x9b73d1779c41dca36314fb7c4d3309838e20c4e7.sol#592-602) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_accountHolder,_amountofENJ) (/unique_chucks/2/0x9b73d1779c41dca36314fb7c4d3309838e20c4e7.sol#596)

ENJCrowdfund.processContribution (/unique_chucks/2/0x9b73d1779c41dca36314fb7c4d3309838e20c4e7.sol#624-635) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/2/0x9b73d1779c41dca36314fb7c4d3309838e20c4e7.sol#631)
